body.raw:
{
    "name": "RouteShadow",
    "prefix": "/shadow/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,
    "strategy": {
        "type": "shadow",
        "shadow_backend": "Test2"
    },
    "backends": [
        {
            "name": "Test1",
            "addr": "http://localhost:7070",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:7071/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "4xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.6,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:7070/"
        },
               {
            "name": "Test2",
            "addr": "http://localhost:9090",
            "weight": 0,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:9091/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:9090/"
        }
    ]
}

{
    "name": "RouteHeader",
    "prefix": "/header/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,
    "strategy": {
        "type": "header",
        "header_name": "ToTest2",
        "header_value": "true",
        "old_backend": "Test1",
        "new_backend": "Test2"
    },
    "backends": [
        {
            "name": "Test1",
            "addr": "http://localhost:7070",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:7071/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "4xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.6,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:7070/"
        },
               {
            "name": "Test2",
            "addr": "http://localhost:9090",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:9091/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:9090/"
        }
    ]
}

request.description: get a route by parameter ID

body.raw:
{
    "name": "WAHub Dummy",
    "prefix": "/wahub/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST",
        "PUT",
        "DELETE",
        "PATCH",
        "HEAD",
        "OPTIONS",
        "TRACE"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/watest/",
    "cookie_ttl": "10m0s",
    "strategy": {
        "type": "canary"
    },
    "switchover": {
        "from": "v0-1-0",
        "to": "v0-1-2",
        "conditions": [
            {
                "status": false,
                "metric": "ResponseTime",
                "operator": "<",
                "threshold": 1000,
                "active_for": "10s",
                "resolve_in": "0s"
            },
            {
                "status": false,
                "metric": "5xxRate",
                "operator": "<",
                "threshold": 0.3,
                "active_for": "10s",
                "resolve_in": "0s"
            },
            {
                "status": false,
                "metric": "4xxRate",
                "operator": "<",
                "threshold": 0.6,
                "active_for": "10s",
                "resolve_in": "0s"
            }
        ],
        "timeout": "15s",
        "weight_change": 5,
        "rollback": true,
        "allowed_failures": 2,
        "failure_counter": 3
    },
    "healthcheck_bool": true,
    "healthcheck_interval": "5s",
    "monitoring_interval": "5s",
    "timeout": "10s",
    "idle_timeout": "30s",
    "scrape_interval": "5s",
    "proxy": "",
    "backends": [
        {
            "id": "f8b76420-f863-498e-b273-e5b1af607e8e",
            "name": "v0-1-0",
            "addr": "http://v0-1-0-wabizdummy-svc.depoy-testing:8080",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": true,
            "scrape_url": "",
            "scrape_metrics": null,
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": "5s",
                    "resolve_in": "0s"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": "5s",
                    "resolve_in": "0s"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": "5s",
                    "resolve_in": "10s"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://v0-1-0-wabizdummy-svc.depoy-testing:8081/prometheus",
            "active_alerts": {}
        },
        {
            "id": "ca29f519-07d8-4911-a525-177e6a4bdc5f",
            "name": "v0-1-2",
            "addr": "http://v0-1-2-wabizdummy-svc.depoy-testing:8080",
            "weight": 0,
            "active": true,
            "scrape_url": "http://v0-1-2-wabizdummy-svc.depoy-testing:8081/prometheus",
            "scrape_metrics": [],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": "10s",
                    "resolve_in": "5s"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.2,
                    "active_for": "5s",
                    "resolve_in": "20s"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": "5s",
                    "resolve_in": "10s"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://v0-1-2-wabizdummy-svc.depoy-testing:8080/watest/",
            "active_alerts": {}
        }
    ]
}
